ygData.subject: RE: Testing LotGP and Kedge Keep was Observations: Uppe r & Lower Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Augmentation is supposed to offset stamina drain as well.  An enchanter friend of mine reported it completely eliminated the stamina drain of swimming.  So
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 29 Oct 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> We (at least most if us) zoned in and were greeted by a "stiletto piranha" -
> conned red to a 36 ranger and blue to a 40 SK (presumably put right there at
> he zone to eat solo artists). Chomp chomp - we killed him - long melee.
> Have your sta song loaded - swimming and fiting will burn sta like crazy.
> We saw some other fishies to fight and they were blue cons to me.

Augmentation is supposed to offset stamina drain as well. An
enchanter friend of mine reported it completely eliminated the
stamina drain of swimming. So if you have an enchanter or
shaman in the group, this would probably be a good buff as
well.

*cringes at the thought of having to give up two song slots
for jig and aquatic ayre*

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
